Pre-Game Insights: Afghanistan captain Rashid Khan emphasized the importance of not thinking about the pitch and boundary size, and instead focusing on delivering good yorkers.
United States captain Monank Patel expressed satisfaction in their team's growing reputation, while South African skipper Aidan Markram looked forward to the business end of the tournament.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The United States will be looking to further enhance their reputation against a South Africa team that has won all their games but not been particularly convincing.
The match between the USA and SA will be played at the Sir Vivian Richards Stadium in North Sound.
